glue_schur Class Reference
[Glue_schur]

#include <glue_schur_proto.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class which implements the immediate Schur product (element-wise multiplication) of two or more matrices.

Definition at line 21 of file glue_schur_proto.hpp.
